summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsGive BackRefresh and hydrate tired eyes with the Cica-Hyal Hydrogel Eye Patches from Mixsoon. Created to provide lasting hydration, this formula aims to strengthen the skin barrier and reduce the appearance of fine lines.
details: DetailsBenefitsThese eye patches provide moisture for dry under eyes and help reduce the appearance of wrinkles to brighten the eye areaThe spatula included in the packaging helps with easier, more hygienic useFor additional skincare benefits, these eye patches can also be used around the mouth and betweent the eyebrowsKey IngredientsCentella Asiatica - Promotes collagen production, which helps to heal wounds and scarsHyaluronic Acid - Maintains skin's natural elasticity by providing a more supple and resilient skin barrierItem 2643840How To UseApply the eye patches on under eye area after cleansing and leave on for 20-30 minutes. Gently pat to aid absorption.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Carrageenan, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Potassium Chloride, Hydroxyacetophenone, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Cellulose Gum, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Allantoin, Propanediol, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Sucrose, Calcium Chloride, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Caprylyl Glycol, Adenosine, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium EDTA, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Arginine, Menthoxypropanediol, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Madecassoside, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Houttuynia Cordata Extract, Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate, Taraxacum Officinale (Dandelion) Leaf Extract, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Madecassic Acid, Asiatic Acid, Potassium Hyaluronate, Asiaticoside.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply the eye patches on under eye area after cleansing and leave on for 20-30 minutes. Gently pat to aid absorption.
